files.patch:
@@ -190,0 +190,1 @@
+# SOURCES is a single string containing embeded newlines.
@@ -196,2 +197,5 @@
-
-    SOURCES=$SOURCES" $SOURCE_PREFIX""$root""$SOURCE_POSTFIX"
+    # Add line termination/indentation for everything after the first entry.
+    if [ "x$SOURCES" != "x" ]; then
+      SOURCES="${SOURCES}\n      "
+    fi
+    SOURCES="${SOURCES}${SOURCE_PREFIX}${root}${SOURCE_POSTFIX}"
